The claim originated from an article pub: based website called Great Game India, which describes itself as a "journal of geopolitics and international relations."
The article has garnered more than 15: 000 interactions on Facebook, indicating a level of attention and potential spread.
Multiple Facebook posts have shared the: further amplifying its reach and potential influence.
The claim was refuted by the WHO: with their communications officer stating that the WHO office in Tanzania is still operational and that there is a good relationship between Tanzania and the WHO. The Minister of Foreign Affairs of Tanzania also dismissed the claims as "completely fake."
